snippet: Bermane Stiverne stopped Chris Arreola in the sixth round in Los Angeles to claim the World Boxing Council heavyweight title vacated by Vitali Klitschko.
abstract: Bermane Stiverne stops Chris Arreola in the sixth round in Los Angeles to claim the World Boxing Council heavyweight title.
lead_paragraph: Bermane Stiverne stopped Chris Arreola in the sixth round in Los Angeles to claim the World Boxing Council heavyweight title vacated by Vitali Klitschko.
